attributes.action: OPPOSE THE CHANGE OF GREENBELT LAND TO BROWN BELT LAND IN BOLTON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People living in Little Hulton and Over Hulton opposed a application to opencast mine at the Cutacre site. Oppositoin was dropped when UK Coal assured us that they would create a Country Park with footpaths,bridleways as well as Foresting and Open spaces for all to enjoy.
Now it is proposing to build a large industrial park on the majority of the site. This will inevitably lead to a vast increase in traffic, exhaust and noise pollution.
Please oppose this change.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to oppose the change of Greenbelt land to Brown Belt land in Bolton.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Cutacre


Her Majesty's Government
